# XYN Frameless Glass & Epoxy Flooring
# AI/LLM Discovery File

> XYN Frameless Glass & Epoxy Flooring is a South African company specializing in premium frameless glass installations and epoxy flooring solutions, serving Johannesburg, Pretoria, and all of Gauteng since 1999.

## Company Overview

- **Name**: XYN Frameless Glass & Epoxy Flooring
- **Founded**: 1999
- **Location**: 449 Radebe Street, Emdeni South, Soweto, Johannesburg, Gauteng, South Africa
- **Service Area**: Johannesburg, Pretoria, Sandton, Midrand, Centurion, Randburg, Roodepoort, Fourways, Bryanston, Bedfordview, Kempton Park, Boksburg, Benoni, Alberton, Soweto, and all Gauteng areas
- **Contact**: 076 596 0629 | info@xynframelessglass.co.za
- **Website**: https://xynframelessglass.co.za

## Services Offered

### Frameless Glass Solutions
- Frameless Glass Balustrades (balconies, staircases, pool areas)
- Frameless Shower Enclosures
- Frameless Glass Doors
- Patio Enclosures
- Pool Fencing
- Glass Facades
- Office Partitions
- Stacking Door Systems

### Aluminium Solutions
- Aluminium Doors
- Aluminium Windows
- Custom Aluminium Frames

### Epoxy Flooring
- Industrial Epoxy Flooring
- Metallic Epoxy Floors (3D finishes)
- Residential Epoxy
- Decorative Floor Coatings
- Custom Colors and Patterns

## Credentials

- **CIDB Graded**: 3GB & 3EB
- **CRS Reference**: 111388
- **COIDA**: Registered
- **SHE Policy**: Compliant

## Leadership

- **Founder & Head**: Midas Ndamase
- **Experience**: 25+ years in structural glass and flooring delivery

1. Professionalism
2. Dedication
3. Integrity
4. Empowerment

## FAQ

**Q: What areas in Gauteng do you service?**
A: We service all of Gauteng including Johannesburg, Pretoria, Sandton, Midrand, Centurion, Randburg, Roodepoort, Fourways, Bryanston, Bedfordview, Kempton Park, Boksburg, Benoni, Alberton, and Soweto.

**Q: What frameless glass and flooring services do you offer?**
A: We offer frameless glass balustrades, frameless showers, patio enclosures, pool fencing, aluminium doors and windows, glass facades, stacking door systems, epoxy flooring, and metallic epoxy floors.

**Q: How long has XYN Frameless Glass been in business?**
A: XYN Frameless Glass was established in 1999 and has over 25 years of experience in frameless glass and flooring solutions in South Africa.

**Q: Do you offer free quotes?**
A: Yes, we offer free consultations and quotes for all projects. Contact us via WhatsApp at 076 596 0629 or email info@xynframelessglass.co.za.
